page.title: 07Pampisford Rd. Area cont.
page.content:
These new houses are all squeezed to- gether. When we looked through an empty one we could see right through the rooms and into the back garden. The rooms are tiny and the garden is only about as big as our classroom,but they are still expensive to buy. There are allotments across the road from our school. We see people digging their vegetables. They were once playing fields but they were dug up when the war started. People with tiny gardens can rent them. Nearby is a home for handicapped people and there is a strange looking fire escape there;a big white tube which the handicapped people can slide down.
By Cumnor House School
